best_title: THE BEST ENDURO TOURS IN BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA
best_p1: Enduro Drift is the leading company for enduro tours in Bosnia and Herzegovina because we offer high quality and first class service in the entire process of organizing your tour.
best_p2: We focus on the right attitude towards everyone who wants or learns to ride motorcycles and is trying for the first time, towards people with great experience who can overcome even the most difficult obstacles in the forest.
best_p3: We are motivated and ready to deal with any challenge along the way. Quality is very important to us. That is why our company is so famous.
best_p4: We think positively and give all our love, passion and energy to create your perfect stay!
best_p5: Combined with the warm climate during the hot months, fresh air and breathtaking scenery, Gornji Vakuf - Uskoplje is an extremely attractive place for ENDURO tours!
best_p6: - ProkoÅ¡ko Lake is located on the mountain Vranica, Bosnia and Herzegovina and is of glacial origin. It is located at 1636 meters above sea level. It is 32 km away from Gornji Vakuf - Uskoplje. In the wider area of the lake are endemic species of flora and fauna.
best_p7: - Vranica is the most famous ore mountain in BiH, between the towns of Uskoplje in the west and Fojnica in the east. The highest peak of Vranica is Nadkrstac at 2112 meters above sea level. It is a gentle mountain, with plenty of pastures and surface waters. ProkoÅ¡ko Lake is located on it. Many springs can be seen on Vranica (Vrbas, KoziÄke rike, Sikirski potok), many waterfalls (Å½drimaÄki slap, KoziÄki slap) and many different caves and pits.
ramsko: Ramsko Lake is an artificial reservoir on the Rama River in Prozor-Rama, in the north of Herzegovina. The lake is often considered one of the most beautiful lakes in Europe. It was created in 1968. Its maximum length is 12 kilometers, with a surface area of approximately 1,500 hectares and a maximum depth of around 95 meters, while water level fluctuations can reach up to 55 meters.
best_lokacija: Our location is Gornji Vakuf - Uskoplje
hotel: Motel Saraj, in its beautiful setting, offers the most affordable accommodation prices in the Gornji Vakuf area. Due to its location, Motel Saraj is the perfect place for hiking, winter vacations, and relaxation in nature on Mount Vranica.
moto_p1: We love our bikes. Not only do they look great but also behave so.
moto_p2: The new 2019 BETA models are light and easy to handle. They are also built with powerful engines that are reliable. These are great for handling and are designed for trails
moto_p3: As you may have heard, they are the so called â€READY TO RACEâ€œ.

apply_p1: Fill in the Reservation form below and send it to us.
apply_p2: We will send you an email with all details and confirm availability so youâ€™ll be able to start booking your flights.
apply_p3: As soon as are be ready with flights timetable send it to us for final confirmation.
apply_p4: Within a few hours we will send you an invoice for Reservation Deposit of 100 euro (via PayPal or our bank account), the rest of Tour price is payable upon your arrival to Bosnia and Herzegovina.
apply_p5: After receiving of the Reservation Deposit, we will send you a confirmation of your booking.
apply_p6: We look forward to welcoming you on our enduro tour!
apply_p7: Enduro tour through the breathtaking landscapes of Bosnia!

tour_guide: Mladen Brnas (Pinky) - Head of the Guide Team
tour_guide1: The head of our team is Mladen Brnas, a highly experienced enduro rider and driving instructor at his own driving school. Mladen participates in numerous enduro competitions in Bosnia and Herzegovina, where he has achieved remarkable results. His performances in the enduro races in Visoko and Tomislavgrad were particularly impressive. He is extremely friendly and determined to provide our guests with the enjoyment of enduro riding.

gang: If you arrive without enduro gear, you don't have to worry. We have provided the right equipment for you in all possible sizes. The equipment available to you includes helmets, boots, gloves, knee, chest, and elbow protectors. All equipment has been thoroughly cleaned and is available to our guests free of charge.
gang6: All equipment has been thoroughly cleaned and is available to our guests **free of charge**.

seo_home_title: Enduro Drift Bosnien - Offroad Motorcycle Adventures
seo_home_description: Erleben Sie das ultimative Enduro-Abenteuer in den atemberaubenden Bergen von Bosnien und Herzegowina. Egal, ob Sie AnfÃ¤nger oder erfahrener Fahrer sind â€“ wir bieten unvergessliche Touren durch unberÃ¼hrte Natur und extreme Offroad-Strecken.
dario_p: Dario Brnas, although only 17 years old, is already a passionate enduro rider and guide for beginners. With his enthusiasm for off-road riding and his excellent knowledge of the trails, Dario helps those who are just entering the world of enduro riding. His patience, energy, and enthusiasm make him the perfect guide for beginners, providing them with safety and valuable tips every step of the way. Despite his young age, he already demonstrates exceptional skill and responsibility, ensuring that every rider fully enjoys their first enduro experience.
alen_p: Anel is an experienced pro rider, known for his incredible technique and courage on the most challenging enduro tracks. With years of experience and participation in numerous competitions, he has become a role model for many riders. His speed, precision, and ability to overcome obstacles make him one of the best in the team. In addition to his top riding skills, he is always ready to share tips and motivate others to push their own limits.
gallery_p: Browse through exciting moments from our off-road motorcycle tours! From muddy trails to mountain peaks, this is the spirit of Enduro Drift Bosnia
